import { useContext, useEffect } from 'react'; import { LanguageContext } from '../data/language'; import * as API from '../data/dataAPI'; import bg1 from '../images/pages/home/bg1.jpg'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import CardsWithImages from '../components/cardsWithImages'; import FlossHome from '../components/animations/flossHome'; import BannerWithText from '../components/bannerWithText'; import RandomBannerGenerator from '../components/randomBannerGenerator'; import { LazyLoadImage } from 'react-lazy-load-image-component'; import Map from '../components/map'; import Language from '../components/language'; function Home() { const language = useContext(LanguageContext); const homeLiterals = API.getPages('Home', language.lang); return (
{homeLiterals.message1.title}

{homeLiterals.message1.message}

{homeLiterals.message2.title}

{homeLiterals.message2.message}

{homeLiterals.buttonTitle}
) } export default Home;
